metadata.inclusion:
Add(Classic Inclusion) : 1. Put your Z-Wave™ controller into inclusion mode by following the instructions
provided by the controller manufacturer. 2. Press the include button three times within 3 seconds to enter
inclusion mode
metadata.exclusion:
Remove (Exclusion) 1. Put your Z-Wave™ controller into exclusion mode by following the instructions
provided by the controller manufacturer. 2. Press the include button three times within 3 seconds to enter
exclusion mode. 3. Node ID will be excluded
metadata.reset:
Reset : 1. Press the include button four times within 3 seconds and hold on the button press without
releasing. 2. Keep pressing the button for 3 seconds then LED will be o ,release the button within 2 seconds.
3. Device has been reset. ※Function Reset : Please use this procedure only when the network primary
controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
